brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this post-approval registry is to provide additional real-world evidence of the performance of the OCS Heart System to preserve DBD donor hearts.

detailed_description.textblock: Multi-center, observational post-approval registry to compare patient and graft survival of adult primary heart transplant recipients receiving DBD donor hearts perfused and assessed on the OCS Heart System compared to adult recipients of DBD donor hearts preserved using ischemic cold storage hearts (Control) at the same Registry centers over the same time period.

primary_outcome.description: Patient survival at one-year post-heart transplant

other_outcome.description: Heart graft survival at 6 months post-heart transplant
For both OCS Heart PAP and Control Recipients: K-M Patient survival at 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 years post-transplant K-M Graft survival at 6mo, 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 years post-transplant

intervention.description: Multi-center, observational post-approval registry to compare patient and graft survival of adult primary heart transplant recipients receiving DBD donor hearts perfused and assessed on the OCS Heart System compared to adult recipients of DBD donor hearts preserved using ischemic cold storage hearts (Control) at the same Registry centers over the same time period.

study_pop.textblock: Participants will be adult primary heart transplant potential recipients on the waiting list for heart transplantation at the participating Registry centers.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult primary heart transplant recipients
Exclusion Criteria:
- Concurrent (multi-organ transplant) or previous solid organ or bone marrow transplant; or
- On renal dialysis at time of transplant
